an5.245:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of bad conduct.
an5.245:1.4: After examination, sensible people criticize you.
an5.245:1.6: You drift away from true teachings.
an5.245:1.8: These are the five drawbacks of bad conduct.
an5.245:2.1: There are these five benefits of good conduct.
an5.245:2.4: After examination, sensible people praise you.
an5.245:2.6: You drift away from untrue teachings.
an5.245:2.8: These are the five benefits of good conduct.”
